content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Plate Production Facility at Position (-13.0, -48.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (-15.0, -50.0) extracting iron ore.
- Wooden Chest at position (-14.5, -48.5) storing iron ore.
- Stone Furnace at position (-13.0, -48.0) smelting iron ore into iron plates.
- Burner Inserter at position (-14.5, -46.5) transferring iron ore from the chest to the furnace.

### Coal Mining and Processing Facility at Position (41.0, -82.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (41.0, -82.0) extracting coal.
- Wooden Chest at position (41.5, -80.5) storing coal.
- Stone Furnace at position (43.0, -82.0) processing materials.
- Burner Inserter at position (43.5, -80.5) transferring materials to the furnace.

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when placing entities with insufficient space or direction
- Ensure there is enough space and the correct direction is set before placing an entity. Consider increasing spacing, changing direction, or adjusting the reference position to avoid collisions with existing entities.

### Errors due to insufficient inventory items
- Verify that you have the required items in your inventory before attempting to insert them into a structure. Ensure you have sufficient coal or other necessary resources to avoid insertion errors.
